# sLMR

This is a scripting system for the Last Millennium Reanalysis project,
or [LMR](https://atmos.washington.edu/~hakim/lmr/).

## Requirement
Python 3

## Features

+ Run LMR with Slurm on a cluster with one command

## How to install
```bash
pip install slmr
```
